testcase.name: Check Keep Me Logged In Checkbox Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed Then the user sees the "Keep Me Logged In" checkbox.........................passed

testcase.name: Check Opening Application After Logout With Keep Me Signed In
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application - false................................passed And the user clicks on the "Keep Me Logged In" checkbox.....................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Logout" text in the Menu........................passed And the user closes the application.........................................passed And the user opens the application - false..................................passed Then the user sees the "LOGIN" screen.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Keep Me Logged In
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application - false................................passed And the user clicks on the "Keep Me Logged In" checkbox.....................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user closes the application........................................passed And the user opens the application - false..................................passed Then the user sees the "Welcome" screen.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check Login Without Checkbox Redirects To Login Screen
testcase.system-out: Given the application state was reset.......................................passed And the user opens the application - false..................................passed And the user sees the "LOGIN" screen........................................passed And the "Keep Me Logged In" checkbox is not checked.........................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed When the user closes the application........................................passed And the user opens the application - false..................................passed Then the user sees the "LOGIN" screen.......................................passed
